RANGERS AT BRUINS > In progress (NBCSN)

Live blog: Rangers score first against Bruins

The Bruins are taking their second swing at eliminating the Rangers from the playoffs. If they get past the Rangers, the Bruins will play the Pittsburgh in the Eastern Conference Final. We have live updates.
  • Pictures Scenes from the Bruins-Rangers series | Bruins Daily No reason to hit the panic button, yet

Missing UNH student's case a chilling mystery

The circumstances of Elizabeth Marriott’s death remain a dark mystery involving a couple who authorities said trolled fetish websites in search of sex slaves. (12:06 p.m.)
  • 10/14/12 Man charged in death of UNH student from Mass.

Thousands finish Boston Marathon

Runners and their supporters came out to finish what they started, jogging the final mile of the Boston Marathon. (2:28 p.m.)
  • Pictures OneRun scenes
  • Some runners will finish race at Indy 500
  • More security at Burlington race
